book_items.title: Nigeria and Inflation.
book_items.content: A novel set in the Nigerian economy during the reign of Tinubu AKA agbado, focusing on the trial of a country called the african giant.
book_items.author: Bola Ahmed Tinubu (BAT)

book_items.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
book_items.content: A novel set in the American South during the 1930s, focusing on the trial of a black man accused of raping a white woman.
book_items.author: Harper Lee

book_items.content: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian regime, where the government controls every aspect of citizens' lives.
book_items.author: George Orwell

book_items.title: The Great Gatsby
book_items.content: A tale of the American Dream set in the 1920s, exploring themes of wealth, love, and the pursuit of happiness.
book_items.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

book_items.title: The Catcher in the Rye
book_items.content: A coming-of-age novel narrated by a teenager struggling with the phoniness of the adult world.
book_items.author: J.D. Salinger

book_items.title: Pride and Prejudice
book_items.content: A classic romance novel set in rural England, revolving around the Bennet family and their relationships.
book_items.author: Jane Austen

book_items.title: The Hobbit
book_items.content: An adventurous tale of Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit who embarks on a quest to reclaim treasure guarded by a dragon.
book_items.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

book_items.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
book_items.content: The first book in the Harry Potter series, following the journey of a young wizard, Harry Potter, at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
book_items.author: J.K. Rowling

book_items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
book_items.content: The first part of the epic fantasy series, following the journey of Frodo Baggins to destroy the One Ring and defeat the Dark Lord, Sauron.
book_items.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

book_items.title: Brave New World
book_items.content: A dystopian novel set in a futuristic society where technology and conditioning control every aspect of life.
book_items.author: Aldous Huxley

book_items.title: Moby-Dick
book_items.content: An epic tale of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest for revenge on the elusive white whale, Moby Dick.
book_items.author: Herman Melville
